title: HKLMSystemCurrentControlSetServices
extract: The HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services registry tree stores information about each service on the system. Each driver has a key of the form HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\DriverName. ... A driver can store global driver-defined data under its key in the Services tree.Apr 19, 2017
extract_html: The HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services registry tree stores information about each service on the system. Each driver has a key of the form HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\DriverName. ... A driver can store global driver-defined data under its key in the Services tree.Apr 19, 2017
